proposal: Understanding the essence of Wormhole's mission to bridge the gap in blockchain connectivity, we see a world of possibilities for collaboration. With 36 holders in the ETH network, you're already weaving the Web of Web3. Imagine integrating our DEX, Lottery, or even CrossChain tools to further empower your community, enabling anyone to deploy and share in the success. Let's connect the dots together, making the blockchain web even stronger.
